website_summaries.verdict: This machine is capable of producing enough rich lather for professional-level use, but it also has some known quality concerns.
pros: A large-capacity machine that earns praise for making lather that's smooth and creamy
Comes with a slip-resistant pad, cleaning brush, and a bottle of liquid shave cream
cons: Can take a bit longer than expected to heat – up to an hour or more
Some owners complained of leaks and machine malfunctions after several months of use

customer_reviews.title: I used this product while in barber school. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product while in barber school. The reason I am giving it four stars is because if the water level goes slightly lower than the fill line", it takes longer for the lather to come out. Another complaint is that sometimes, the lather is SO hot, it is too much for me to handle. Other times, it's not warm enough, no matter how long the latherer has been running. It still gets the job done, though and I haven't found another product that compares to it, so four stars seems reasonable even with my concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: For a professional machine, with the cost of $170 this lather machine should last years. I am very disappointed in this & have already had to order a replacement. I have followed all of the cleaning instructions & it still isn’t working.
customer_reviews.author: Dezignr

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time within 2 days. Took it out of the box. Read and followed the directions. The machine worked just as it should. I had hot lather in 10 mins and shaved my client. Even he said it’s the closest clean shave he’s had by a barber. No drips or leaks. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kae

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lather machine because I had one in The past that worked perfect. This one keeps emptying the lather out everywhere all of a sudden and I could never get the foam right. I can’t seem to get ahold of anyone about product warranty either.
customer_reviews.author: Justin the Barber

customer_reviews.title: A great Lather King replacement
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a new lather machine after going through 3 of the 2nd generation Lather King machines which are complete pieces of garbage. I was skeptical of the Lather Time machine, but these things are workhorses. I’ve since bought 4 and have never had a problem. Just a tip:put them on a timer to turn them off at night. You don’t need hot foam 24houra a day. You’ll burn out that coil and the soap gets grody.
customer_reviews.author: Spangenberg

customer_reviews.title: Never worked correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Never worked correctly. I was excited to use it on my first client of the day so I got to work early and mixed everything as per the directions. I literally had to hold the button for a solid minute to get anything worth putting on the back of the neck for a lineup. To top it off, it never really got that warm. It’s called hot lather for a reason. Returning and getting something better :(
customer_reviews.author: Matt Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Product works great. Takes longer to heat then instructions state so ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Takes longer to heat then instructions state so I just leave it on. Been running for about 6+ months and working great
customer_reviews.author: Steve R. Maestas

customer_reviews.title: Did not work! Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a licensed barber and this did not work! It did not dispense the lather at all. Very disappointed in this purchase. Do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I'm a master Barber my old lather machine stop working stop working and in my profession it is a musthave so i went to Amazon and it arrived in perfect timing 2 day's i was Amazed with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I definitely Recommend it. I’m very Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: It makes the shaving cream very rich and smooth. I definitely Recommend it. I’m very Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a month ago while I was setting up my shop. Opened box three days ago...it worked for three days then stopped. Three. Days. You can buy this junk machine. OR You can just light your money on fire. Dealers choice.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am barber for 25 years and bought it for my shop , so far it's 2 weeks and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pugliese

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Lather Machine - Could Be Hotter & Dispense Faster
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hot lather machine over a year ago. I really like the warm lather that dispenses from it , however; I wish it would come out hotter. Also, the lather comes out too slow most times... It sounds like a chew-chew train! Overall, I'm quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ferrill

customer_reviews.title: So far - so good
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of this brand. Have always used latherking but the quality of latherking has gone down over the years. Tried an andis brand. It lasted one year. Have been using this brand for three months. No problems. Lather is not as good as latherking but I’m willing to trade that for a machine I can get several years out of. I drain and clean every week to keep it from getting clogged up.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Just okay, gets the job done. Leaks sometimes and often doesn't make a real rather. Most of the time lather is runny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Hot Enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lather machine because it had great reviews and because I always e joyed the feeling of the HOT lather when I would go to the barber shop. The consistency of the foam in his machine, is excellent but it isn't hot enough when compared to the one that my barber has. I don't know if it's a manufacture's defect or what, but I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I had to have it replaced. Because the first one had a short and shocked me. The company sent me a replacement. It works really good!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: short term use
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I'm sending back! Now it is leaking out of the bottom of the machine. For the price this sucks! Make a quality product please.
customer_reviews.author: Hogjawz

customer_reviews.title: Greatest closest shave
customer_reviews.text: First time using heated lather for shaving and is the closest shave if I’ve ever had. I use a shave oil as a base
customer_reviews.author: Russell M.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use nice hot warm  cream..
customer_reviews.text: I just received my machine my new machine works perfect the store took care me the next day Great companW Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Best  hot lather machine
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quick - easy to mix lather and instructions are easy to follow for set up Only downside of this lather machine is there is NO On/off switch, so you have to unplug every time you are not using it
customer_reviews.author: Isabel/Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: Lather comes out hot!!! I love this machine. Beats the heck out of mixing in a bowel.
customer_reviews.author: diesel dave

customer_reviews.title: Heating element not working
customer_reviews.text: I’m a barber and have used various lather machines including this one. This one I ordered irked me in particular because the heating element did not work and then when I go to return it, the price went up for reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Bellotte

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand lather machine in many barber shops before. So, I ordered one for my own shop and it does not work. It will not get hot, at all- not even warm. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Zackery White

customer_reviews.title: Lathertime / Scalpmaster
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for 1 year , just recently starting making loud noises, any ideas what could be causing this ?
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: luke warm at best.
customer_reviews.text: Works correctly but lather doesn't get very hot, luke warm at best.
customer_reviews.author: mark marzella

customer_reviews.title: Scalpmaster hot lather machine-great for home use too.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this after decades of using a soap, cup, and brush. Works as intended. We leave it plugged in for daily use. We clean it out per instructions when it runs out of lather.
customer_reviews.author: leslea caschette

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My machine leaks from the bottom its poured all the solution multiple times. Never had one do this before I have only used 3 weeks not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t heat up called manufacturer they said “ call amazon” amazon doesn’t know how these work the mfg should
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Schneeweiss

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt lather well. Even with the proper mixture it spits hot water n diluted lather
customer_reviews.author: Heather Boehmer

customer_reviews.title: My lather machine
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Barber, and I love this machine. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be a little hotter..
customer_reviews.text: Clogs up more than the I like.works good. Just have to clean out more than the others I have used..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The lather lasts for just seconds. And is not a strong foam at all. I have tried different lathers but this problem still exists and 170.00 isn’t cheap
customer_reviews.author: lisa romano

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Been a barber for 40 years. Best latherizer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I’m a master barber and I use this everyday, if you’re a barber and you’re reading this I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: hectorg

customer_reviews.title: Key today’s make a right soap mix
customer_reviews.text: Love This machine is working with this a whis for a while
customer_reviews.author: nerik kuinov

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I just Purchase from this seller the machine is leaking Dont by this it’s garbage
customer_reviews.author: igor

customer_reviews.title: Keeps lather hot and ready . Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! I love it! Definitely worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice Foam Comes Out hot for the client it's made well fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Street Cutts

customer_reviews.title: Not built for the long haul
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 18 months despite regular cleaning with expensive solution. Makes noise but not lather.
customer_reviews.author: MJ P.

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've been a barber for 36 yrs, I bought this for my shop when my old one finally wore out. So far I'm very happy with it, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great Burmax Hot Latherizer
customer_reviews.text: This new brand of latherizer works just as horribly as a different brand we'd used before. After reading the good ratings this one had gotten, I was so hopeful this would be much better. However, upon usage, I found it to sputter somewhat. UPDATE: Turns out my boss was mixing his lather up incorrectly. Upon cleaning it out and replacing it with the CORRECT mix, it works great. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cathy kingston

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product for my barber. After 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my barber. After 3 months of daily use it's no longer putting out lather, hot or cold.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brangers

customer_reviews.title: S***ty birthday
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this as a birthday present for my wife and she finally got it put to use at the end of September. There is a problem with it and it leaked all over her back bar ruining a pair of clippers. Looks like the body if it has an imperfection. Bad thing is I can't return or replace after 30 days and I can't figure out how to contact the seller. HAPPY FRIGGING BIRTHDAY!
customer_reviews.author: Wes Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Machine leaks a great deal of water and soap mixture
customer_reviews.text: Machine leaks a great deal of water and soap mixture. The amount of lather it seems to produce is small
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: For what's on the market these are the best. Always use distilled water and it will not clog so fast like many people complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than newer lather king!
customer_reviews.text: Using at barbershop! I ordered the lather king awhile back (the new model). I couldn't get it working right no matter how I mixed, so I sent it back and got the lather time and found that it works so far like a charm. I had the older lather king for 15 years and hated when it broke but this lather time is doing well, just remember it's better to mix your lather alil to heavy than it is to not have enough. Personally I do 1 bottle in 3/4 of a gallon. UPDATE - - Been a professional barber for 25 years and after using this several days I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson from M. B. S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer does not stand behind product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for Father’s Day. Worked great for about two weeks. Gets clogged and the shaving cream comes out very thin. Because I shopped early for Father’s Day, I was outside my 30 days to return to amazon. Contacted the Manufacturer and basically was told it was not their problem because I bought thru Amazon. Pretty expensive item for no one to claim responsibility!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kreitz

customer_reviews.title: I always wanted a product like this.
customer_reviews.text: A bit more expensive than I thought it would be. Instructions are sketchy. Does not come with an "On and Off" button. Does not have a light to tell you that the unit is on. I ended up getting an adapter. Takes about 15 -29 minutes to warm up. Lather is just luke warm. Not very foamy either.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I leave the unit plugged in all the time and it provides thick hot lather everyday. I would suggest you double the amount of soap... two capfuls instead of one for each tank full of water. I clean the machine once a week using the brush that was supplied with the unit. Hot lather every morning... I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this product until it breaks and at $200 a piece, I would like it to last longer than 2-3 months This is the second one I've had since I opened my business and I have literally only been open for 5 months
customer_reviews.author: Sierra R. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 5 months. Numerous attempts to unclog it with the included brush and water have not been successful. The motor spins up and makes a really loud noise, but hardly any foam comes out.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for the first three months. The heating element broke first and then no lather would dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. My old model finally died after years ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My old model finally died after years of use. I was so happy to find this machine when i searched for it online. Quality product that works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Save your money breaks right after return date
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this however after 2 months of use the motor gave out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a month. Cleaned it out following directions and nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Petie

customer_reviews.title: This will do but I wish someone will make a better machine
customer_reviews.text: This one does not work perfectly but I have two more that work fine. These definitely work better than the new latherking machines.
customer_reviews.author: Master Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, works great now since I bought it (3 months), would buy it again if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Make sure you follow the directions and clean as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: I love this latherizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this latherizer, but I've owned two that have had a slow leak from the bowl and you always realize it too late and have a huge mess to clean up. More qc needs to be done at the factory. But if you get one that works it is far better than any of the other ones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jo McIntire

customer_reviews.title: It works well for personal use
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my home for personal use. I was afraid that leaving it on for 24 hours would be a problem or not cleaning it daily. I've had it for a couple of weeks and was able to leave it plugged in 24 hours with the soap and cleaner in it and I've had no problems. Every so often I just stick a brush through the nozzle to make sure it's clean.
customer_reviews.author: JAYZEE

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed in this machine.I unpacked and followed the instructions for setup and use etc, and it worked great! Nice hot, soapy lather etc. Went to use it the next day , plugged it in and came back 30 mins later and the later was cold, the machine will now not heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tool!!!!! wanted to start shaving in my shop... and this device foots the bill to a tee!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey gammel

customer_reviews.title: This one surprised us as being better than we expected
customer_reviews.text: So many of the newer latherizers are junk. We bought this to hold us over while we refurbished our older ones that have stood the test of time. This one surprised us as being better than we expected. We have had it for about six weeks of heavy duty use and it has performed well. We leave it on all the time as we are a barber shop open 12 hours daily. That way the lather is always hot. The lather comes out thick and warm. I somehow expected it to be runny.....but we were pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

product_meta.title: Lather Time Professional Hot Lather Machine
product_meta.description: ** LATHER TIME Professional Lather Machine *** Creates thick, aerated, super wet lather for professional results!* Push button for easy dispensing* Extra large soap cup* Non-slip safety rubber pad* Cleaning brush* Long lasting DC motor* 8oz bottle of liquid shave cream included!* Approximately 9"l x 5"h x 4"w** HC700 Poly/Cotton Hair Cloth **Old Fashion Hair Cloth* Traditional Poly/Cotton* Black & White striped hair/chair cloth* 45"W x 50"L* Extra Large Neck (about 28")* Made in the USA!* Comes with Cloth Clip to Fasten Cape Around Neck** Three Premium Plus Triple Blade Disposable Razors *** Green Rubber Grip Handle* Pivot Head* Lube Strip* Triple-Blade Head* Individually Packaged
feature_bullets: Professional barber electric hot soap machine to create a a thick, aerated, super wet lather for professional results (Long lasting DC Motor)
1 X RUBBER PAD for non-slip safety surface to rest machine on
